chapter_1_1_intro: ^Before unification, there was perpetual war between the states.

^One day, the Virulent Army appeared from thin air and annihilated one
of the states and nearly wiped out the race that inhabited it.

^Seeing the threat of this army, the King of the humans unified the
states under one Kingdom to defeat the Virulent Army.
^Since then, there have been years of peace and prosperity under the Unified King.
